content.prompt: Which of the following statements is true regarding education in Nigeria and Mexico?

choices.label: Partly due to their federalist systems, the quality of education varies by region in both countries.
Both countries have equal educational opportunities throughout the country based on long-standing governmental policies.
As a result of decades of public sector failure, both countries have largely privatized their education systems since the 1990s.
Both countries are committed to secular educational models throughout the country, and religion has very little influence in either country.
